C2 The literal meaning of a word is its original, basic meaning: The literal meaning of "television" is "seeing from a distance". You will need to show more than just a literal understanding of the text. Compare
figurative (LANGUAGE)
A literal translation of a text is done by translating each word separately, without looking at how the words are used together in a phrase or sentence: Her translation is too literal, resulting in unnatural-sounding prose.
